com.kuka.common
Class JniLibExtractor

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.common.JniLibExtractor

public final class JniLibExtractor
extends java.lang.Object

Support Class to extract dso/dll libraries from the JAR. Reason: Java Runtime & Windows is not able to utilize DLL/DSO directly from jar, but they must be manually extracted.

Method Summary
static void extractAllJniLibsFromJar(java.lang.Class aClassDescripton, java.lang.String destDir, java.lang.Boolean flagDoHierarchical)
          extractJni Libraries from DLL looks recursively for all "dll" "so" files within the specified jar, and extracts it to "destDir". depending on flagdoHierarchical, the extraction result is flat (all dlls in destDir or the directory hierarchy is restored) The type of file ".dll" or ".so" is determined automatically by "System.mapLibraryName"
static void extractAllJniLibsFromJar(java.lang.String jarFile, java.lang.String destDir, java.lang.Boolean flagDoHierarchical)
          extractJni Libraries from DLL looks recursively for all "dll" "so" files within the specified jar, and extracts it to "destDir". depending on flagdoHierarchical, the extraction result is flat (all dlls in destDir or the directory hierarchy is restored) The type of file ".dll" or ".so" is determined automatically by "System.mapLibraryName"
static void extractAllJniLibsFromJarToDefaultLibDir(java.lang.Class aClassDescripton)
          extracts JNI Libraries (dll/so) from JAR containing the class.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

extractAllJniLibsFromJar

public static void extractAllJniLibsFromJar(java.lang.String jarFile,
                                            java.lang.String destDir,
                                            java.lang.Boolean flagDoHierarchical)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
extractJni Libraries from DLL looks recursively for all "dll" "so" files within the specified jar, and extracts it to "destDir". depending on flagdoHierarchical, the extraction result is flat (all dlls in destDir or the directory hierarchy is restored) The type of file ".dll" or ".so" is determined automatically by "System.mapLibraryName"

Parameters:
jarFile - the path/fileName to point to the respective jar.
destDir - destination directory to unpack files to.
flagDoHierarchical - -> true - restore hierarchy within jar -> false - unpack flat to destDir.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - exception thrown, if not found.

extractAllJniLibsFromJar

public static void extractAllJniLibsFromJar(java.lang.Class aClassDescripton,
                                            java.lang.String destDir,
                                            java.lang.Boolean flagDoHierarchical)
extractJni Libraries from DLL looks recursively for all "dll" "so" files within the specified jar, and extracts it to "destDir". depending on flagdoHierarchical, the extraction result is flat (all dlls in destDir or the directory hierarchy is restored) The type of file ".dll" or ".so" is determined automatically by "System.mapLibraryName"

Parameters:
aClassDescripton - class for getting class loader
destDir - destination directory to unpack files to.
flagDoHierarchical - -> true - restore hierarchy within jar -> false - unpack flat to destDir.

extractAllJniLibsFromJarToDefaultLibDir

public static void extractAllJniLibsFromJarToDefaultLibDir(java.lang.Class aClassDescripton)
extracts JNI Libraries (dll/so) from JAR containing the class. looks recursively for all platform specific "dll"/"so" files within the containing jar, and extracts it to the default "KUKA Connectivity LIB Directory" The type of file ".dll" or ".so" is determined automatically by "System.mapLibraryName"

Parameters:
aClassDescripton - class for getting class loader, used for locating the containing Java Archive JAR
